Message:
They locked me
inside a tall tower.

As long as I stay here,
those men won’t lay a hand
on Rean or the village.

I’ll be okay.
I’m used to being shut away.

That’s how I’ve always been,
even until now.

But, the one who tried
taking me outside is
no longer here.

I wonder how many days,
or even months,
have passed by since then.

But, in this room where
not even a single ray
of sunlight peeks in,
it’s impossible for me
to even know that.

I don’t even know
why I have to stay
locked up in here.

Suddenly, the crown
fell from my head.

At that moment,
I saw a vision of
a person flash
in my mind.

Am I supposed to be
waiting for someone?

why is something
I can’t remember...
making me hurt
so much...?
